name: Remove Special Characters on Upload
author: Douglas Faria

sections.description:
A plugin that will help you remove special characters from the name of your files.

Descrição

Um plugin que irá remover os caracteres especiais de nomes de arquivos no upload.

Contribute

You can contribute to the source code in our GitHub page.

Contribua

Você pode contribuir com o código aqui no GitHub.

Instalação

Apenas instale o plugin e aproveite! Ele irá atuar silenciosamente no upload nativo de arquivos

Perguntas Frequentes

Esse plugin funciona com a função upload de outros plugins?
Se esse plugin utiliza o upload nativo, sim.
sections.installation: Just install and enjoy plugin. This plugin works with the native upload function.
sections.faq:
This plugin works with others plugins that use upload function?

If this plugin to use native upload function, yes.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • First version

1.1

  • Corrections and general adaptations

1.2

  • Added compatibility with WordPress 6+
